headline: Here's Why Philip Morris Raises Its 2025 EPS Guidance Again
summary: PM hikes its 2025 EPS guidance as smoke-free products like IQOS and ZYN boost the second-quarter performance.

headline: Altria Group: Dividend King Or Smoking Illusion
summary: Altria Group faces falling tobacco volumes and a stock-price disconnect, but stable EBITDA and strong dividends support resilience. Read why MO stock is a hold.
